# quantifiedSelf (Insight Timer Summary Stats)

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: stable](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-stable-brightgreen.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#stable)
<!-- badges: end -->

Explore Insight Timer session data with the [plotly](https://plotly.com/) visualization library.

## Live app

The live app can be found at [yogat3ch.shinyapps.io/quantifiedSelf](https://yogat3ch.shinyapps.io/quantifiedSelf)

My session data is loaded as example data for new users to explore how the visualization works.

## Comments & Suggestions
Please feel free to leave comments & suggestions via the [Github Issue tracker](https://github.com/yogat3ch/quantifiedSelf/issues)!
